item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 26, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Before you buy a domain name, first check to see if it's haunted (550 points | 104 comments)

10. Live imaging of ovulation in action reveals three distinct phases (4 points | discuss)
11. We Can Terraform the American West (71 points | 73 comments)

24. Astronomers discover complex carbon molecules in interstellar space (114 points | 19 comments)
25. Streaming joins are hard (100 points | 41 comments)
26. Kronos: Soviet Processor Family for High-Level Languages (2006) [pdf] (47 points | 8 comments)
